reviews.title: Great as always

reviews.text: (4) Washing machine, dryer and detergent provided
reviews.title: quality apartments

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is the second Meriton we have stayed at and whilst the view was not the greatest, the price ($78/night) and the appointments were. The room was a fully furnished one bedroom apartment with kitchen laundry & bath. All new. Bed was 2 singles zipped together with made a king. AC, balcony and large LCD TV. Security is excellent with parking @ $5 per night. The street is not an option. We stayed for 10 days. Unfortunately there is a lot of work going on in nearby area (installing the GC light rail tracks) which needs a little planning to get around but that will recede. I was attending a Hospital nearby and it was perfect. Also Australia Fair shopping centre is three mins by car. Well done Meriton.
reviews.title: Best value on Gold Coast

reviews.text: This place was fantastic. Perfect for any traveler staying in one spot for several days.
reviews.title: Hidden Gem

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check in was simple, friendly and painless. Need parking? No worries, an extra $5 per night will cover you.
reviews.title: Best place ever .....

reviews.text: The room was spacious, with separate air conditioning in the lounge room and bedrooms. Everything was spotless. Carpet, furniture, spotless, just as if you were home. The bathroom was clean too, not a spot of mold and the provided soaps and products were nice to use.
reviews.title: Excellent accommodation

reviews.text: The added laundry and complimentary laundry liquid IN your room is the perfect reason to stay if you are staying put for a few days.
reviews.title: My last 3 stay was great and my forth one was disappointing :(

reviews.text: Had a fantastic stay great servece clean staff and house keeping were fantastic will definitely be staying at meriton apartment again great kitchen facilities close to cafes. Roomy apartment. Regards evangelia
reviews.title: Perfect clean great facilities

reviews.text: Excellent facilities almost comparable to five star. Perfect responsive staff and arrangements which fit in once's budget. Locations which is perfect to see major attractions like surfers paradise, various beaches, etc.
reviews.title: Perfect Accommodation for family tours

reviews.text: Hello Max
reviews.title: Thanks for the excellent stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Thanks for the wonderful service throughout our stay. The apartment was in excellent condition and it was well maintained. All the staff were kind and courteous and were genuinely caring in their service. We had a wonderful stay overall. We strongly recommend to anyone who is planning a trip to Southport or nearby places.
reviews.title: Perfect place to stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Regards
reviews.title: awesome

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Very impressed with the cleanliness and the facilities available in the apartment. Fortunate to have a room with great views of the marina. Staff were very courteous and helpful. Would certainly stay there again.
reviews.title: Great Views

reviews.text: I Came here from the Zetland Meriton and had enjoyable 6 night stay with just some very minor things to nitpick. The Internet passwords should be offered or automatically given at check in. This was not done in Zetland either so it must be a training or company policy issue, but having to go back down to reception 5 min after checking in is annoying. The flooring material in the non carpeted areas of the rooms are prone to getting dirty, so they need to be cleaned more thoroughly between rentals. After the first day i realized i should probably wear shoes in the apartment. Also, the king bed in 509 had something sticking up in the middle that made it slightly uncomfortable. And if you do not have a car, you might want to pay extra and book the Broadbeach location because there is nothing around here except for the mall. The walk to Surfers is very far and even the bus stop is a 10 min walk from the apartments.
reviews.title: Another good stay with Meriton

reviews.text: The apartment was clean and had good kitchen facilities/washing m/c/dryer.The sink in the batthroom was tiny and was difficult to use without spilling water on the floor.There was a lovely Thai restuarant and Italian restaurant walking distance to the block.Unfortunately there was no gym and the pool was outdoors and it was rather windy and rained during our stay so we could not make use of it.Short drive to Sea World.
reviews.title: Clean new apartment

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We have stayed at the Meriton Apartments in Southport a few times last year for about two nights each time. The apartments are excellent very clean and plenty of room the service is great and so is the staff it is very quiet. We will be staying again in May 13 I would definately recommend these apartments to anyone they are excellent value and have everything in them that you need.
reviews.title: Jill Mackay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We booked a one-bedroom apartment for our 9 day christmas vacation and were put on the 8th floor away from the elevator (as I am a light sleeper, it's lovely that the note must be in my profile as a reminder to them) and we were upgraded to a two-bedroom apartment for the additional lounge room space, a larger balcony and a separate study. Our second bedroom and bathroom were locked, but that was perfectly fine as we didn't need them. We had 2-3 local friends/family over to visit us and go for a swim in the pool, a spa, and for a BBQ.
reviews.title: 9 day Christmas trip

aka: Meriton Serviced Apartments Southport Gold Coast, Australia
